title: The Mask
medium: lithograph, waxtype, woodcut, screenprint, and collage on 638-g/m2 cold-pressed Saunders Waterford paper
dimensions:
sheet (irregular): 117 x 79.4 cm (46 1/16 x 31 1/4 in.)
framed: 127 x 88.6 x 4.8 cm (50 x 34 7/8 x 1 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Graphicstudio/University of South Florida and the Artist
